column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Iyi nye mbra ahyɛdze a EWURADZE ahyɛ
column7: ma wɔmfa ɔnantwiber memen a nkekaa nnyi ho a onndzi dzɛm a kɔndua nnkɔr no do pɛn:"

column2: "na hom mfa no mma ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column3: na ɔmfa no mpue mbra nseraban no ekyir
column4: na obi nku no wɔ n’enyim:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo Eleazar mfa ne nsatseaba mfa no bɔgyaa bi
column3: na ɔmpetse no bɔgyaa no bi ngu ehyiadzibuw no enyim afamu mpɛn esuon:"

column2: "na obi nhyew ɔnantwiber no wɔ n’enyim; no nwoma
"na ɔsɔfo no mfa kyindur dua
column5: na ɔntow ngu ɔnantwiber a ɔrehyew no do."

column2: "Na afei ɔsɔfo no nhor ne ntar
column4: na n’ekyir no na ɔmbra nseraban no mu
column5: na ɔsɔfo no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia ɔhyew no no nhor ne ntar wɔ nsu mu
column3: na onguar no honam wɔ nsu mu
column4: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na ɔbanyin bi a no ho tsew nsesaw ɔnantwiber no nso no
column3: na ɔmfa nkogu nseraban no ekyir beebi a ɔtsew
column4: na wɔmfa nsie nyɛ Israelmba mboanofo ahoguar nsu: ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na nyia ɔsesaw ɔnantwiber no nso no ɔnhor ne ntar
column3: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir: na ɔnyɛ Israelmba no
column4: nye ɔhɔho a ɔsoɛ hɔn mu no

column2: "Nyia ɔka nyimpa biara no fun no no ho nntsew araa nda esuon:"
"ɔnoara na ɔmfa iyi nguar noho da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: na da a otsia esuon no na no ho atsew: na sɛ oennguar noho da a otsia ebiasa no
column4: nye da a otsia esuon no a

column2: "Obiara a ɔka nyimpa biara a oewu no fun no
column4: ogu EWURADZE ntamadan no ho fi; na ɔkra no wobotwa no efi Israel akyen: osiandɛ wɔammpetse ahoguar nsu no enngu no do ntsi no ho nntsew; n’ahoɔfi da ho wɔ no do."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa wu asese mu a no ho mbra nye yi: obiara a ɔba asese no mu
column3: na obiara a ɔwɔ asese no mu no
column4: no ho nntsew araa nda esuon."

column2: "Na kɔɔpow biara a n’ano da hɔ a onnyi ebuado wɔ do no
"Na obiara a ɔka obi a ɔatɔr nkrantsee ano
column5: anaa nda bi wɔ haban mu no
column6: no ho nntsew araa nda esuon."

column2: "Na nyia no ho nntsew no wɔmfa bɔn ho afɔr nhyewee no no nso no bi
column3: na wɔmfa mbasu ngu do wɔ kɔɔpow mu mma no:"

column2: "na nyimpa a no ho tsew bi mfa odwonhataw
column3: na ɔmfa mbɔ nsu no mu
column6: nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ hɔ no

column2: "na nyimpa a no ho tsew no mfa mpetse nyia no ho nntsew no do da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: nye da a otsia esuon no: na da a otsia esuon no onguar no; na ɔnhor ne ntar
column5: na no ho ntsew ewimbir no."

column2: "Na nyimpa a no ho nntsew
column4: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi bagua no mu
column5: osiandɛ oegu EWURADZE krɔnkrɔn bea ho fi: wɔmmpetsee ahoguar nsu no wɔ no do; no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze mma hɔn: na nyia ɔpetse ahoguar nsu no nhor ne ntar; na nyia ɔka ahoguar nsu no no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."
"Na adze biara a nyimpa a no ho nntsew no ka no
column3: no ho nntsew; na ɔkra a ɔka no no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."
